product_name: Liberty Mountain ID and Gear Marking Tape
long_description: Even the most well-intentioned climbing partner might accidentally snag one of your unmarked carabiners. Keep track of your costly equipment by marking it with this ID and Gear Marking tape. Carabiners, cams and slings get all mixed up after a long day of swapping leads and sharing a climbing rack, so mark your gear to make sorting it out simple. Choose a couple different colors to create a unique color combination so you'll know for sure which gear is yours. Each tape roll measures 60 ft. long x 0.5 in. wide.
short_description: Even the most well-intentioned climbing partner might accidentally snag one of your unmarked carabiners. Keep track of your costly equipment by marking it with this ID and Gear Marking tape.
